tool.name: rpcgen
tool.summary: Sets construction variables for building with RPCGEN.
tool.sets: RPCGEN RPCGENFLAGS RPCGENCLIENTFLAGS RPCGENHEADERFLAGS RPCGENSERVICEFLAGS RPCGENXDRFLAGS

builder.name: RPCGenClient
builder.summary:
Generates an RPC client stub (_clnt.c) file from a specified RPC (.x) source file. Because rpcgen only builds output files in the local directory, the command will be executed in the source file's directory by default.
# Builds src/rpcif_clnt.c env.RPCGenClient('src/rpcif.x')

builder.name: RPCGenHeader
builder.summary:
Generates an RPC header (.h) file from a specified RPC (.x) source file. Because rpcgen only builds output files in the local directory, the command will be executed in the source file's directory by default.
# Builds src/rpcif.h env.RPCGenHeader('src/rpcif.x')

builder.name: RPCGenService
builder.summary:
Generates an RPC server-skeleton (_svc.c) file from a specified RPC (.x) source file. Because rpcgen only builds output files in the local directory, the command will be executed in the source file's directory by default.
# Builds src/rpcif_svc.c env.RPCGenClient('src/rpcif.x')

builder.name: RPCGenXDR
builder.summary:
Generates an RPC XDR routine (_xdr.c) file from a specified RPC (.x) source file. Because rpcgen only builds output files in the local directory, the command will be executed in the source file's directory by default.
# Builds src/rpcif_xdr.c env.RPCGenClient('src/rpcif.x')

cvar.name: RPCGENCLIENTFLAGS
cvar.summary: Options passed to the RPC protocol compiler when generating client side stubs. These are in addition to any flags specified in the &cv-link-RPCGENFLAGS; construction variable.

cvar.name: RPCGENFLAGS
cvar.summary: General options passed to the RPC protocol compiler.

cvar.name: RPCGENHEADERFLAGS
cvar.summary: Options passed to the RPC protocol compiler when generating a header file. These are in addition to any flags specified in the &cv-link-RPCGENFLAGS; construction variable.

cvar.name: RPCGENSERVICEFLAGS
cvar.summary: Options passed to the RPC protocol compiler when generating server side stubs. These are in addition to any flags specified in the &cv-link-RPCGENFLAGS; construction variable.

cvar.name: RPCGENXDRFLAGS
cvar.summary: Options passed to the RPC protocol compiler when generating XDR routines. These are in addition to any flags specified in the &cv-link-RPCGENFLAGS; construction variable.
